definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: I bedded the traveller for a night.
sentences.chinese: 我爲這位旅客提供一夜住宿。

sentences.english: During Training period, accommodation charge is wived .
sentences.chinese: 訓練期間，住宿營費用經已括免。

sentences.english: Would you fill out the registration form, please?
sentences.chinese: 請您填一下住宿登記表號嗎？

sentences.english: Cavendish College provides a comprehensive service to students requiring accommodation in London.
sentences.chinese: 卡文迪什學院爲需要住宿的學生提供全面的服務。

sentences.english: They mount to the hull and attach to the cowl easily and stay securely fastened when running.
sentences.chinese: 他們安裝在船體和重視罩容易和住宿穩妥運行時。

sentences.english: Arrange accommodations for at least the first night of your trip.
sentences.chinese: 至少安排好旅行中第一個晚上的住宿。

sentences.english: Accommodation is guaranteed to all first -year students.
sentences.chinese: 所有一年級新生均可享學校住宿。

sentences.english: Tonight, stay in 3-star Xiyu Yongsheng Hotel or equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，住宿於桃園山莊或同級3星酒店。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻將屋位於主樓5樓，集住宿娛樂於一體。

sentences.english: Betty is going to put up at the Anello Hotel on the third day of her trip to Athens .
sentences.chinese: 貝蒂在她到雅典旅行的第三天，要住宿在安妮羅飯店。

sentences.english: Where did a no-frills mother of four boys fit?
sentences.chinese: 哪裏適合一個穿着平淡無奇的四個孩子的媽媽住宿呢？

sentences.english: Make sure you have clear directions from your place of lodging to the organization.
sentences.chinese: 一定要清楚從住宿地去面試地點的路線。

sentences.english: Accommodation varies from simple guesthouses to luxury accommodation. Patong has got everything a tourist needs.
sentences.chinese: 住宿從簡單的客棧到華貴的住所都有。

sentences.english: Guests can also free use the brandnew hot spring baths with a appointment.
sentences.chinese: 住宿貴賓可不限次數預約無償使用全新私人風呂湯屋。

sentences.english: He saw a blackboard.The names of all the guests were written on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他看見一塊黑板，上面寫著所有住宿客人的名字。

sentences.english: So went the present over before him: and himself lodged that night in the company.
sentences.chinese: 於是禮物先過去了那夜雅各在隊中住宿。

definition: standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
to check in (at a hotel etc)
